title: Abstract Submission Accepted
description: My abstract submission on 'Compiler for data-oblivious programs' was accepted to TECHCON 2023. I will be giving a presentation on September 11, 2023

title: Poster Presentation Web App
description: Check out the companion web app I built for my OCTAL poster. The app lets you take my poster home and provide feedback.

title: Poster Submission Accepted
description: My poster,OCTAL: DSL for Data-Oblivious Programs, was accepted to the 44th IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (S&P), I will be presenting OCTAL during the poster session.

title: I was chosen to attend DAC 2023
description: My application to attend the 60th design automation conference was accepted, I will be presenting OCTAL during the poster session.

title: ISPASS Submission Accepted!
description: Our paper 'Exploring the Efficiency of Data-Oblivious Programs' was accepted to 2023 IEEE International Symposium on Performance Analysis of Systems and Software (ISPASS)

title: I attended ISPASS 2023
description: I attended the 2023 IEEE International Symposium on Performance Analysis of Systems and Software at Raleigh, North Carolina.
